question: Match the following:
columnB: Are the sole members of the Kingdom Monera
Such as hot springs, deserts, snow and deep oceans
Live in or on other organisms as parasites

answer.Kingdom Monera: Are the sole members of the Kingdom Monera
answer.Bacteria live in extreme habitats: Such as hot springs, deserts, snow and deep oceans
answer.Many bacteria: Live in or on other organisms as parasites
